home.title: BlackJack
home.welcome: Welcome to BlackJack on containers. You are welcome to join an already existing table, or create a table yourself. When you create a table, you will become the dealer, and you will receive a link to invite players to your table.

create-dialog.title: Create table
create-dialog.text: This is where you create a new table. When you create a new table, you become the dealer. Start with naming your table:

join-dialog.title: Join table
join-dialog.text: This is where you join an existing table. Enter the table code and click 'Join' to enter the table

add-player-component.title: Add a new player
add-player-component.text: A table can host up to three players. You can add yourself to a table and join the game.

player-name-dialog.title: Player name
player-name-dialog.text: Please enter your name, and make sure this name complies to our Code of Conduct.

table.title: Table not found
table.text: The table code used to join a table does not exist.

sessions.createfailure: Failed to create session, this happens when an error occured on the server
